channel.title: 000webhost curl request to seller api
channel.description:
Hey there! I'm here to ask a question do you guys block 000webhost requests? because I'm trying to send a curl request to my seller api and it gives me this error:
"Failed connect to keyauth.win:443; Connection timed out"
(by the way I tried a raw pastebin and that worked perfectly)
If I don't respond hit me up on discord Smeezy#9999

item.title: 000webhost curl request to seller api
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
Try this code and replace with your URL

<?php

$url = "https://example.com";

$curl = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$resp = curl_exec($curl);

?>

If it still doesn’t work, please send the URL and replace your seller key with sellerkeyhere

Read full topic

item.title: 000webhost curl request to seller api
item.dc:creator: Tommy_Nulled
item.description:
That’s very strange but maybe 000webhosting is blocking the connection to other websites.
Also I don’t suggest you to use 000webhosting since if you are their client for very long time, after 1 year they will delete your account with no reason.

Read full topic

item.title: 000webhost curl request to seller api

item.description:
that’s literally what I’m getting not sure if I did something wrong
sorry for the delay

item.title: 000webhost curl request to seller api
